metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16402 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low.
metadata.Description:
libelf/elf_end.c in elfutils 0.173 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double free and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact because it tries to decompress twice.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16402` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

debuginfod - 0.176-1.1
elfutils - 0.176-1.1
libasm1 - 0.176-1.1
libdebuginfod-common - 0.176-1.1
libdebuginfod1 - 0.176-1.1
libdw1 - 0.176-1.1
libelf1 - 0.176-1.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: ccdm94> the vulnerable code was introduced with commit 272018bb (0.165).

criterions.comment: elfutils package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.176-1.1').
